nodes.text: The Charbodians were the inhabitants of the Charbodia system in the Inner Rim. One Charbodian worthy of note was a military cook at a Galactic Republic medical station on Drongar during the Clone Wars.

The Charbodians are mentioned in the novel MedStar I: Battle Surgeons, written by Michael Reaves and Steve Perry and published by Del Rey in 2004. The book does not specify whether the term Charbodian refers to a sentient species or is merely a planetary demonym, such as Corellian or Hapan.
